fields.description: This is the unique identifier for the Ad hoc Bank Transaction. If you do not specify an ID, Workday generates one automatically.

This is the unique identifier for the Ad Hoc Bank Transaction Number. You must set up sequence generation for Workday to generate and assign a number automatically. If not, the number remains blank.
